entry.title: Dove Soap Extra Fresh
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dove
Type: Soap
Price: 17.99

Dove Men+Care Soap Extra Fresh 3.17 oz, 3 Bars

  • Dove Men+Care Extra Fresh Body and Face Bar thoroughly cleanses and hydrates for healthier, stronger skin versus regular bar soap
  • Made with 1/4 moisturizing cream - thoroughly cleans skin without leaving it feel dry or tight
  • Patented design with unique technology developed for men's skin
  • Revitalizing formula, provides fresh, clean feeling that rinses off easily
  • Fights skin dryness for total skin comfort and the extra refreshment you want

Irish Spring Original, Deodorant Bar Soap, 3.7 Ounce, 12 Bar Pack

Irish Spring Original bar soap delivers the gentle and caring formula you love, with a fresh, clean, and invigorating scent to leave you refreshed. Irish Spring Original Deodorant Bar Soap provides 12-hour deodorant protection, so you can feel fresh throughout the day.

White Jasmine Perfume by Woods of Windsor, Classy, fresh and uplifting, the white jasmine fragrance by woods of windsor offers distinctive, long lasting effect that is bound to linger on you and everyone else. Launched in 2010, its exotic aroma is created by seamlessly combining fresh leafy top notes with refined floral heart of jasmine and the exotic bloom of ylang ylang. The base note of sandalwood and moss completes this aromatic whiff.
